capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's amazing to think that she's an adult now. I mean, can you believe it? She was always so wise and mature, even as a student at Hogwarts. I'm sure she'll continue to be an incredible role model for the younger generation of witches and wizards.
capsules_submitted.reply: that makes my day! valeria, i think there's something interesting here   it seems that mcgonagall and snape are both adults, but we already knew that about snape.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is an adult, and I have to admit, his age has played a significant role in shaping the way he interacts with others, especially Harry Potter. The fact that he's been around for so long has given him a certain level of authority and wisdom, but it's also made him somewhat...prickly.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of personality does snape have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he can be a bit... self-centered. He has this personality that's really focused on himself, which is why people might describe him as selfish.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought he was a bit of a mysterious character, but now that we know his age, it's interesting to consider how that might have shaped him as a person.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what are some of valeria's favorite pastimes or activities she enjoys doing in her free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's beard is really growing in, isn't it? I mean, he's been working hard to maintain that look. It's definitely becoming a part of his overall appearance now.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit on the heavier side, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him around, and yeah, he's definitely carrying some extra weight. (pauses) But hey, we all have our moments, right?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is affiliated with Grandine Company. I've checked our records and it's confirmed that he works there.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he actually has black hair. I'm pretty sure about it, I mean, I've seen him with that color before. He's definitely got a great look going on with those dark locks.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.
